thread.title: J. Scott Martin
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by J. Scott Martin

author: J. Scott Martin
title: J. Scott Martin
text: Did not want to open pkg and return to sender w/o paying gor shopping back to Hong Kong. They refused and only would reimburse upon return and inspection. Forced to open pkg only to find no sunglasses. All makes sense now. Run from them despite low prices
